GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
amt: fix memory leak for advertisement message

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 19bb2d57eac86a368839a92117d8a10ab7183623, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit cbc21dc1cfe949e37b2a54c71511579f1899e8d4. For more details please see the references link.
